metadata.title: CVE-2024-25741 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: printer_write in drivers/usb/gadget/function/f_printer.c in the Linuxkernel through 6.7.4 does not properly call usb_ep_queue, which might allowattackers to cause a denial of service or have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
